snippet: Democrats in Wisconsin have a month to persuade voters to unseat the governor, Scott Walker, in a recall election with Tom Barrett as Mr. Walker’s opponent.
abstract: Milwaukee Mayor Tom Barrett wins a Wisconsin Democratic primary and will face Gov Scott Walker in the recall election in June; Walker, who easily won his own primary contest, expresses confidence about the challenge from the Democrats.
lead_paragraph: Democrats in Wisconsin have a month to persuade voters to unseat the governor, Scott Walker, in a recall election with Tom Barrett as Mr. Walker’s opponent.

headline.seo: Scott Walker Recall Challenger Chosen by Democrats
headline.main: Wisconsin Democrats Choose Challenger to Run Against Governor in Recall Race
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin Democrats Choose Challenger to Run Against Governor in Recall Race
